channel.title: 790 Client Download
channel.description:
Hello MoparScape Members, Today I thought I would release a fixed 790 client for people who want to make their own RuneScape 3 Private Server. You don't have to use Eclipse for this, but you can if you want. There is still 38 warnings when compiling the client though. On top of that there is an error when running the client, but it really doesn't effect it that much and it still runs. I will probably fix it later, but as of now here you go and enjoy!
I do not have the cache, nor do I have the definitions so you can add it to your server to try to connect with it. As soon as I find out the definitions or someone else does I will post them on here and give credits to whoever.
[b]Pictures:[/b] [img]http://i1091.photobucket.com/albums/i398/ipwnu2day/RuneScape3.png[/img]
[b]Download Client:[/b] [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!XEAmBBRK!MC2PliiossJdQr5SkkrftgOK1hA9xgeUX3lYJ9k5kY8]https://mega.co.nz/#!XEAmBBRK!MC2PliiossJdQr5SkkrftgOK1hA9xgeUX3lYJ9k5kY8[/url]
[b]Credits:[/b]
[ul][li]Me[/li] [li]Sir James1996[/li] [li]Deob[/li][/ul]

item.title: 790 Client Download
item.dc:creator: @ipwnu2day ipwnu2day
item.description:
@ipwnu2day wrote:

[quote=“thakillah, post:7, topic:538625”][quote author=ipwnu2day link=topic=657456.msg4398292#msg4398292 date=1389788588]

Nice job. If only someone leaked out the runescape 3 source, which will probably NEVER happen.

You can try modifying a 718 server and create your own 780+ server, but yeah other than that, I don’t think people are going to release a RuneScape 3 source for a very long time.

I actually heard that some people already are working on it. And I must agree with you, it will take a long time. The latest source I saw was 742 on here. But still, there are many good sources, even some 317+'s. One thing is that some people don’t like Evolution of Combat, but some people do.

Yeah when they release a RS3 source some people are probably going to take out EoC. I don’t mind it, but yet I kind of dislike it. EoC kind of reminds me of World of Warcraft.

  1. This is not even yours, you didnt do anything to this.
    2 The error is because of the cache iirc
  2. Youll never get the cache because i dont have it, if someone releases the cache and their prams it will work

At least give me creadits… all you did was rerelease

  1. I made bat programs to run the client, and made a compilier that doesn’t have errors when compiling.
  2. I seen a 790 cache somewhere to work with the client, but I forgot where.
  3. Eventually I will get the cache and release it to work with the client.

I put your name in the credits…
[/quote]

  1. making a bat isn’t work its easy lol
  2. The cache needs to be released but it’s 5gb[/quote]

Yeah I see that it’s 5GB. A little ridiculous, but whatever YOLO.

Read full topic
